review:
He is a good doctor,he listens the issue properly,
Which makes comfortable for the patient in front of doctor. His treatment is good.

Hai Im Jayasree , I ve been suffering from bronchial asthma since 32 years . When I approached Dr.Raghavender I was frequently getting the bouts of breathlessness and lung infections. Now that I m under his medication I feel very much relived and happy to lead a normal life.  He also suggested some valuable life style changes which helped me a lot in coping up with my Asthma.  Thank God I found a Doctor who could understand my condition and gave permanent solutions rather than temporary relief.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is an All rounder experience in one and all. I took my wife initially for her weight loss, frequent Urination. He has checked thoroughly, advised reqd tests, seen reports all (even old) and noted all in prescription, guided properly, referred t Urologist and find out reasons, ref to Endocrinologist fie fuether treatment. I too consulted for my Prostate, Spondylitis, Fungal infection and other age related. He councilled both t understand clearly in detail. We both r very of his TREATMENT and other Aspects. We recommend. Mrs. Lakshmi & Annaji Rao Maruguna
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to give this feedback!

review: Ver good and friendly nature. Spent so much time and completely understand the patient issues. Also he is not confined to particular health issue. He tried to cover previous medical issues also. I can recommend him for best treatment

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I took my mom who is 73 yrs old she has nerves problem and  other things too with her age  ..Usually Doctors wont have time to listen our stories since their job isnt so easy ...however he is too patient, pleasing personality , down to earth attitude..
God bless him always ..

I have taken my mother for diabetes ,acute GE treatment every time when I visit Dr.Raghavendar,  he is out standing at his treatment , medications,and also takes time in explanation of the issue along with preventative care and gives sufficient time for patients for any clarification or route . His team does a commendable job in letting patients know about their next level follow up.
Doctor is friendly and good in giving treatment, moreover doctor available in Morning hours which is very convenient to us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: doctor is very friendly listening all the problems with patience. I would highly recommend this doctor
